title: Regime change is complete institutional change

content.question: Which of the following best describes a regime change?

choices.label: A successful coup d’état occurs in which one political leader replaces another as head of state.
A change occurs in a country’s political institutions and practices, as from totalitarian to democratic rule.
One longtime ruler dies or retires and is replaced by another, who in turn rules the country for a long period of time.
A country’s political leader is replaced by a competitor, either by election or by military force.
An authoritarian ruler is defeated by military force, and a new leader emerges from the lower ranks of the military to replace the former ruler.

content.answer: A change occurs in a country’s political institutions and practices, as from totalitarian to democratic rule.
